name: cnrmtop

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm)))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ CNrm, c0 ∈ Top, ∀(hs0 ∈ P(⋃ c0),(c0[|`t]hs0)∈ Nrm))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wcel(c0, ctop))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ccnrm), wa(wcel(c0, ctop), wral(hs0, cpw(cuni(c0)), wcel(co(c0, crest, cv(hs0)), cnrm))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CNrm → c0 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CNrm ↔(c0 ∈ Top ∧ ∀(hs0 ∈ P(⋃ c0),(c0[|`t]hs0)∈ Nrm)))

comment: A completely normal space is a topological space. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Aug-2015.)
